When we last left Celeron, he had just engaged in a major fire fight.  Luckily for him Captain and the Warden were there to help so Celeron spent the entire fight behind the holotable.  Fumeral had charged into the room, took a quick look around, then was knocked over by the Warden's large energy cannons.  Needless to say, now the Warden had a clear shot, Fumeral was easy to subdue.

The Warden, who couldn't fit into the bridge, managed to stick his arm in and drag Fumeral out of the ship.  The Warden returned to the prison block to put Fumeral back into a working containment cell.

As the Captain tended to his wounded engineer, Celeron tried to put his computer back together.  When Celeron gave up trying, there was an awkward silence.

Finally Celeron spoke:

"don't worry, I was just investigating this ship, I didn't intend to steal it from you."

Captain stared at Celeron.

"I'm not an inmate..."

"Allright.  Then what usefull skills do you have?"

"well....fixing, repairing, salvaging, stealing, killing.... What do you have in mind?"

"Can you help me fix my ship and revive my 8 remaining crewmembers?  I can't give you an official commission, but I can reward you for your work."

"Sure....that can work"

They returned to their work; silently.
